answers.answer: Woah That Is Scary. Are They Gonna Induce You?
He didn't really say. I have an appointment tomorrow I'm going to ask him about it so we'll see but he said he would keep an eye on it. He said we don't want him to get to big.

Apparently that happens when you have gestational diabetes and usually they don't catch it til weeks 28/30 they caught mine early...at 14 weeks they told me that if I didn't get my blood sugar down that the baby would be too big and I would have to have a csection if that happened. Have them check ur blood sugar..I'm sure you will be fine.:) try to stay positive and don't stress

The thing is if they've already checked my glucose and they said it's perfectly normal its really weird. My doctor doesn't even know how to explain it. I'm trying to stay positive about it but it scares me.
Some ppl just have big babies have they done an us to get measurements of baby or was that just fundal height?
They did the ultrasound and got the all the measurements of a 34 week baby and all developments in my child are perfect for a 34 week child.
Maybe they were off all along
Yes maybe your due date is not actually accurate
I am 38weeks & my baby is also measuring big. She weighs 8lbs. I now am getting induced on Friday.
The said same thing to me at 14 weeks my baby was measuring 17,-18 weeks... my baby is very long
Is it possible you could be 34 weeks pregnant?

same with me my docs say im measuring 2w. ahead. I did the gestational diabetes test and I came back normal also. I rather a chubby baby then a scrawny one so im happy. I healthy baby healthy so maybe they got dates wrong might be case for u????

question: So my OB toled me at 30 weeks my baby measured 34 weeks along. I was toled my baby was growing too fast. I am so scared. He said if I go all the way to my due date he will be 13 pounds. Im just wondering if anyone has the same problem or any advice to give. This is my first child and I'm due may 27th.
title: baby is too big?
